mapper.sql: i.id, i.name, i.cardID, i.professor, i.professorCode, i.date, i.enterprise, i.createBy, i.createTime, i.updateBy, i.updateTime, i.version, i.isDeleted, i.sex, i.uploadID, i.type, i.age

where 1=1 and i.id = #{condition.id} and i.name = #{condition.name} and i.cardID = #{condition.cardID} and i.professor = #{condition.professor} and i.professorCode = #{condition.professorCode} and to_days(i.date) = to_days(#{condition.date}) and i.enterprise = #{condition.enterprise} and i.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and i.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and i.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and i.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and i.version = #{condition.version} and i.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and i.sex = #{condition.sex} and i.uploadID = #{condition.uploadID} and i.type = #{condition.type} and i.age = #{condition.age}

where 1=1 and i.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(i.name) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.name}),'%')) and UPPER(i.cardID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.cardID}),'%')) and UPPER(i.professor) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.professor}),'%')) and UPPER(i.professorCode) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.professorCode}),'%')) and UPPER(i.date) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.date}),'%')) and UPPER(i.enterprise) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.enterprise}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(i.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(i.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(i.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(i.sex) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.sex}),'%')) and UPPER(i.uploadID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.uploadID}),'%')) and UPPER(i.type) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.type}),'%')) and UPPER(i.age) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.age}),'%'))
mapper.update: update insuploadday set name=#{name}, cardID=#{cardID}, professor=#{professor}, professorCode=#{professorCode}, date=#{date}, enterprise=#{enterprise}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, sex=#{sex}, uploadID=#{uploadID}, type=#{type}, age=#{age}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from insuploadday i where i.id = #{id} and i.isDeleted = false

select i.name,i.cardID,i.professor,i.enterprise,i.date,i.age,if(i.sex=0,'女','男') as 'sex',if(i.type=0,'30万保额','80万保额') as 'type' from insuploadday i left join insupload iu on i.uploadID = iu.id and iu.status = #{condition.status} ${orderByClause}
